name: Crossing Souls
description: Itâ€™s 1986 in California. A group of friends discover a mysterious pink stone that allows to travel between two realms. This gang will live the summer of their lives in an adventure that will get them involved in a government conspiracy. Control five kids with special skills while fighting and solving puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 3000) or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9600 GT (256 MB) or equivalent Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64 Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (2 * 3100) or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) Storage: 4 GB available space
